title: Appleseed Alpha (Cinevia removed)
description:
Originally uploaded by condors369, I've taken the liberty of removing the Cinavia copy protection for all to enjoy how they please!

From the creator of Ghost in the Shell and the director of Appleseed comes the intense post-apocalyptic prequel, Appleseed: Alpha. Left to survive in a post-World War society, two mercenary soldiers - Deunan and her cyborg partner Briareos Ã¢â‚¬â€œ are sent on a mission on the outskirts of their war-torn city. During the operation, they run into Iris and Olson, two citizens from the utopian city of Olympus, who might have a way to save the world but the ruthless Talos and the scheming warlord Two Horns have their own plans.
